TopicTitle: My little collection of stock crafts.

Articles.Content:
Hi there, i am new to the forums, in fact i dont even know how to post an image properly here, and i think the best way to introduce yourself is to share your crafts. So here are my crafts!

WARNING: These crafts are untested.

Check the images here: http://imgur.com/gallery/7c7OZ/new, im too lazy for albums and URLS.

"Eagle SSTO"

A fancy SSTO with stilish tail and wings, it was designed to get into orbit and then transfer to another planetary body, but the lack of testing left our engineers without any answer to that question, maybe we should hire a skilled pilot to try to drive it, but it would be expensive. Action groups are NOT included.

 

"Wasp VTOL"

A lightweight and cheap VTOL created by the force of boringness, it dont have wheels, or wings, or airplane stuff... But it flies.

 

"Centopede Utility Rover (CUR)"

This Rover is without doubt our masterpiece here at Upper´s Inc Crafts. It explore, mine, convert ore, carry people around, have a service bay, plenty of energy, amazing lamps, can assemble entire bases and look like a train. This is without doubt, the eight wheeled centopede train of MLG and awesomeness. Action groups are NOT included.

 

The ships are over. But our engineers are working are to make some new awesome untested and dangerous crafts for you guys, maybe next week! 

PM me if something went wrong and you had a bad time with any ship.

 

Peace,

Upper Inc Crafts.

Put pics on the page. People don't like leaving the website to see pics. Also, if the SSTO is untested how do you know it is an SSTO?

Edited January 5, 2016 by Majorjim
